data.name: Death's Door Artbook
data.detailed_description: Death's Door Artbook is a 43-page digital artbook that includes screenshots, concepts, and pre-production art hand-curated and designed by the game's art director Frits Olsen.
data.about_the_game: Death's Door Artbook is a 43-page digital artbook that includes screenshots, concepts, and pre-production art hand-curated and designed by the game's art director Frits Olsen.
data.short_description: Death's Door Artbook is a 43-page digital artbook that includes screenshots, concepts, and pre-production art hand-curated and designed by the game's art director Frits Olsen.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
